Summarise mcmc data

summarise.mcmc_data.Rd

Summarise mcmc data

Usage

# S3 method for class 'mcmc_data'
summarise(.data, ..., .fun = sum)

Arguments

.data

An mcmc_data object

...

<data-masking> Name-value pairs of summary functions. The name will be the name of the variable in the result.

The value can be:

  • A vector of length 1, e.g. min(x), n(), or sum(is.na(y)).

  • A data frame, to add multiple columns from a single expression.

Returning values with size 0 or >1 was deprecated as of 1.1.0. Please use reframe() for this instead.

.fun

The function to use to summarise the MCMC samples.
